original_text: Why leap ye, ye high hills? this is the hill which God desireth to dwell in; yea, the Lord will dwell in it for ever.
korean_text: 너희 높은 산들아 어찌하여 하나님이 계시려 하는 산을 시기하여 보느냐 진실로 여호와께서 이 산에 영원히 계시리로다

sentences.original_text: Why leap ye, ye high hills?
this is hill which God desireth to dwell in;
yea, Lord will dwell in it for ever.
